dict.string: Precision Target Analysis uses your camera to automatically detect and measure impact groupings on paper targets for competitive ballistic sports training and precision improvement.
Precision Target Analysis saves your training session images with impact analysis overlays to help track your competitive ballistic sports progress over time.
Precision Target Analysis accesses your photo library to save target analysis images for competitive ballistic sports training documentation and progress tracking.
Precision Target Analysis connects to your Apple Watch to provide real-time shot notifications during training sessions.
